# Section 3

This is going to make a plot. First I generate a dataframe, then 
use `ggplot to make a scatterplot.

## Plots from last time

```{r chunk_scatterplot,echo=FALSE}
plot_df<-
  tibble(
    x=rnorm(n=1000),
    y=1+2*x+rnorm(n=1000)
  )

ggplot(plot_df,aes(x=x,y=y))+geom_point()
```

### Plot for Learning Assessment

This is a quick solution to learning assessment.
```{r learning_assessment}
la_df<-
  tibble(
    norm=rnorm(n=500,mean=1),
    logical=norm>0,
    abs_norm=abs(norm)
  )

ggplot(la_df,aes(x=abs_norm))+geom_histogram()
```
